casebody.data:
No. 285,

Misc.

Fowler v. Wilkinson, Warden. Leon S. Epstein and Carl A. Herbig for petitioner. Solicitor General Rankin for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted limited to the gross sentence question.
